answers.answer: Hi!The symptoms can be side effect of withdrawing too fast from prednisolone. Otherwise they can be due to peripheral neuropathy secondary to diabetes or thyroid problems, lupus etc. Severe anemia is also a possibility. Please consult a doctor immediately regarding this.You may need to restart steroids.
